channel.title: Help with minigame

item.title: Help with minigame
item.dc:creator: @staticfish1 staticfish1
item.description:
@staticfish1 wrote:

I need to know how to make an interface like such

public void nzpanel() {
setInterfaceWalkable(15892);
sendQuest("Nazi Zombies", 15894);
sendQuest("Zombies left to kill "+PlayerHandler.nzleft+"", 15895);
("Points: "+nzpoints+"", 15897);
sendQuest("", 15898);
sendQuest("", 15899);
sendQuest("", 15900);
sendQuest("", 15901);
sendQuest("", 15896);
sendQuest("", 15902);
sendQuest("", 15903);
sendQuest("", 15904);
sendQuest("", 15905);
sendQuest("", 15906); 
       }

How would I declare the nzpanel, nzleft, nzpoints, and all of those. I would like them to be

nzpanel = Name of the Interface that is shown
nzleft = The amount of zombies left to kill in that round
nzpoints = The players points they have

I think I know how to make an npc give a player the points, but Im not sure. Could someone link me to a page about that or post a code?

Read full topic
